response.original_title: Can you call someone on a Royal Caribbean cruise
response.overview: Yes, you can call landlines or cell phones on shore from your Royal Caribbean cruise ship, but it is quite expensive +1→{855}→732→4023. You can make these calls directly from your stateroom phone, and the charges will be added to your onboard account +1→{855}→732→4023. Yes, you can call someone on a Royal Caribbean cruise, both onboard and from land +1→{855}→732→4023, but it can be expensive; options include in-stateroom phones for free inter-ship calls +1→{855}→732→4023, the Royal App for messaging, purchasing ship Wi-Fi for apps like WhatsApp/FaceTime, or using costly cellular roaming/ship-to-shore services for calls to/from land.
response.title: Can you call someone on a Royal Caribbean cruise
